LogueEffectInfo.Name: Boookbinder
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: All Librarians have +2 max. Passive Attribution cap.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Reminiscence
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Gain {0} Objet D'Art Key Pages and Combat Pages of the current chapter.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Lucky Tael
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Gain {0} Ahn. Add 1 Shop to next chapter's reception pool
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Said to use winds and clouds to attract merchants.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Cup of Greed
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Select a Combat Page from your current Bookshelf and add it to another Librarian's hand. Can be used once per Act
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“A must have for hoarders and spendthrifts alike.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Cup of Greed
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Give a copy of {0} to the selected Librarian
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“A must have for hoarders and spendthrifts alike.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Two-Leaf Clover
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Replaces Three-Leaf Clover. +1 max. Passive Attribution cap. At the start of each Scene, every Librarian gains 1 Luck
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“You're unsure if its damaged or extra rare.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Blast Furnace
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“You're unsure of how such bulky equipment helps you in this situation, but it does.”</color>
